name: Flouray
description:
Flouray is a strategic base-building game.

Assets:

Pixel Interface - https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-interface

Tiny 16 - https://sharm.itch.io/tiny16

Overworld - Grass Biome - https://beast-pixels.itch.io/overworld-tileset-grass-biome

Pixel fonts - https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free

Game Collectable Pack - Pixelart - https://aamatniekss.itch.io/game-collectable-pack-rotating

Pixel mobs - https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-mob
